snippet: Mr. Shelton and his longtime design partner, Lee Mindel, were known for interior designs that blended clean lines with references to classical periods to create opulent settings.
abstract: Peter Shelton, award-winning architect, dies at age 67.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Shelton and his longtime design partner, Lee Mindel, were known for interior designs that blended clean lines with references to classical periods to create opulent settings.

headline.seo: Peter Shelton, Architect Who Made Luxury Minimal, Dies at 67
headline.main: Peter Shelton, Architect Who Made Luxury Minimal, Dies at 67
headline.print_headline: Peter Shelton, 67, Architect Who Made Luxury Minimal
